This is the best multiplayer FPS game, I'd vote ever made. I can't speak to the other versions Counter-Strike but the beauty of this game is in it's simplicity. The maps are basic, so are the guns, and so are the mechanics.
its probably the most american game ive played; having to buy your own guns, extremely cheap
